posts.content:
afternoon all, its been a while! can any of you guys tell me who does blank panel sets for panel vans, all of the ones i've seen are for combi's etc, also how are you peeps doing the interior rear corners on small back windows? have tried making this panel but its got some many angles, does anybody do one?

al

the guy on ebay who sells the plytrim reckons he can do all the panels for a panel van

even in Birch or ash ply - he gave me a quote of £200 (in birch) for all panels including doors and roof

i thought that was pretty good

i had some off him for my early bay and the fit was spot on
interesting..... can you remember his user name?
nice one fella

this sounds interesting i need a set for my 56 panel . have you spoken to him?
what are they like to cover ?
I spoke to spirit of the 50 for a lower set in a solid colour no heat sealing a bit like standard £270 . would like a full set though.

I am also trying to figure out how to do the rear corners of my 61 panel with small rear window. I have the rest in which came with the van when I bought it, but these peices are missing. If you find anything out let me know. Also if you have no luck with getting any interior let me know and I will speak to the guy I got my van from and find out where mine came from. If you are ever down the devon part of the world you are more than welcome to use mine as templates as they have no trim on them yet. They are all there except from the 2 rear corners.
the rear corners are a pain! there is lots of different angles going on, i,ve tried pvc sheet and flexi ply but with not much sucsess, i think now i,m going to use foam and glue it in....al
